channel.title: Quick Select on Hashnopolis
channel.description: Recent content in Quick Select on Hashnopolis

item.title: K Closest Points to Origin
item.description: We have a list of points on the plane. Find the K closest points to the origin (0, 0). (Here, the distance between two points on a plane is the Euclidean distance.) You may return the answer in any order. The answer is guaranteed to be unique (except for the order that it is in.) Example 1: Input: points = [[1,3],[-2,2]], K = 1 Output: [[-2,2]] Explanation: The distance between (1, 3) and the origin is sqrt(10).
